Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by San Diego in 2010...
Traded from San Diego to New York (A) on 5/23/2011 (Going to NYA: RF D. Vettleson, P J. Odorizzi. Going to SDN: P R. Porcello, P H. Brown, 2B M. Quintana)...
Had first career hit on 5/16/2013, off Ian Kennedy (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/17/2013, off Brett Myers (BAL)...
Traded from New York (A) to Philadelphia on 3/2/2014 (Going to NYA: 2B M. Cuddyer. Going to PHI: CF D. Vettleson, P H. Okajima)...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2015...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/5/2019, hitting .654 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 8/12/2019...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Washington on 4/14/2020...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Pittsburgh on 5/23/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/3/2021, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/2/2021, hitting .593 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis on 8/25/2022...
